welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carouge, the charming and colorful city known for its Italian influence and vibrant markets. Get ready to experience the unique blend of history, culture, and modernity and enjoy your stay exploring its hidden gems."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
